message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product. I'm excited to discuss the price with you. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer you the product for $1,400,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer. While I recognize the value of the product, I think your initial offer is a little high for my budget. I'd be willing to purchase the product for $1,000,000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I still believe the product is worth more to you. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer the product to you for $1,200,000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering its true value.
